ipcameraperformance: Max. resolution is 1080P; Outdoor installation; Use IR-cut filter, can change IR and color filter, 4mm Lens; Build in 30pcs IR LED, up to 25 meters night vision; Not support to power off IR LED manually.
otherperformance: PC software,support for Microsoft Windows 98/2000/XP/Vista/Windows 7/Mac OS,And the Internet Explorer6.0 and above ,Firefox,Chrome,Safari etc., provide IPCMonitor.exe client software
